title: Judgment as bar
context: ยง662-10 Judgment as bar. The judgment in an action under this chapter shall constitute a complete bar to any action by the claimant, by reason of the same subject matter, against the employee of the State whose act or omission gave rise to the claim. [L 1957, c 312, pt of ยง1; Supp, ยง245A-10; HRS ยง662-10]
